sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.allocationWorkbenchFilter</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>allocationWorkbenchFilter</name> <script><![CDATA[function allocationWorkbenchFilter(rowType, resourceFilter, aggregateColumn, startDate, endDate, searchBy, group, role, user, manager, skill, skillsFilter, pivotType, finderStartDate, finderEndDate) { var resourceFinderService = new ResourceFinderDataService(); return resourceFinderService.getFilteredUsersForDrillDown(rowType, resourceFilter, aggregateColumn, startDate, endDate, searchBy, group, role, user, manager, skill, skillsFilter, pivotType, finderStartDate, finderEndDate); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-24 01:27:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>91426e9953723010f069ddeeff7b1229</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>allocationWorkbenchFilter</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Resource Grid Interface" source="com.snc.resource_grid">7e00da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_91426e9953723010f069ddeeff7b1229</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-24 05:25:33</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
